DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to develop an Internet-based self-help therapy program for insomnia in Chinese language, and to conduct a randomized waiting-list controlled trial on the efficacy of Internet-based self-help therapy for insomnia.
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a randomized controlled trial in patients with insomnia. Eligible subjects will be randomly assigned to self-help treatment with telephone consultation (SHTC), self-help treatment without telephone consultation (SH), or waiting-list control. The subjects will receive self-help treatment once per week for 6 consecutive weeks. In addition to self-help treatment, the subjects in SHTC group will receive telephone consultation once per week for 6 consecutive weeks.
